SQL.LOAD: SELECT company_credit_card_id, dealer_id, merchant_code, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, merchant_code_id FROM elp_merchant_code WHERE merchant_code_id = :merchant_code_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select MC.MERCHANT_CODE_ID, CCC.company_credit_card_id, T.translation as company_credit_card_type, MC.MERCHANT_CODE from ELITA.ELP_MERCHANT_CODE MC, ELITA.elp_company_credit_card CCC, ELITA.elp_credit_card_format CCF, ELITA.elp_list_item I, ELITA.elp_dict_item_translation T, ELITA.elp_language L WHERE MC.COMPANY_CREDIT_CARD_ID = CCC.COMPANY_CREDIT_CARD_ID and CCC.credit_card_format_id = CCF.credit_card_format_id and CCF.credit_card_type_id = I.list_item_id and I.dict_item_id = T.dict_item_id and T.language_id = L.language_id and L.language_id = :language_id and MC.dealer_id = :dealer_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_merchant_code SET company_credit_card_id = :company_credit_card_id, dealer_id = :dealer_id, merchant_code = :merchant_code, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE merchant_code_id = :merchant_code_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_merchant_code ( company_credit_card_id, dealer_id, merchant_code, created_by, merchant_code_id ) VALUES ( :company_credit_card_id, :dealer_id, :merchant_code, :created_by, :merchant_code_id )
